title: Project Kusha: India's Iron Dome-style Air Defence System
summary: DRDO is developing a long-range air defence system to intercept stealth fighters and missiles at ranges up to 350 km.

title: New Chief of Defence Staff (CDS) Appointed
summary: Gen. Anil Chauhan takes charge, focusing on military theaterisation and jointness among the armed forces.

title: ISRO's Gaganyaan Mission: Astronaut Training Update
summary: The four selected astronauts have completed their training in Russia and are now undergoing mission-specific training in India.

title: India-US Joint Military Exercise 'Yudh Abhyas'
summary: The latest edition of the exercise focuses on high-altitude warfare and counter-terrorism operations in Alaska.

title: INS Vikrant Completes Sea Trials
summary: India's first indigenously-built aircraft carrier, INS Vikrant, has successfully completed its fourth phase of sea trials.
